Name:
USS Claxton
HMS Salisbury
Salisbury
Fate:
Transferred to United Kingdom, 5 December 1940
Transferred to Canada September 1942
Sold for scrap 26 June 1944
Notes: In "care and maintenance" status from November 1943
Armament:
4 x 4"/50 caliber guns
1 x 3 in (76 mm)/23 gun
12 x 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
